data.title: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within swinging onto iPhone
data.meta_description: Gameloft has confirmed that the Prince of Persia series is coming to iPhone. Earlier in the week, a teaser video was released for a
data.text:
Gameloft has confirmed that the Prince of Persia series is coming to iPhone.

Earlier in the week, a teaser video was released for a "New Gameloft game". Although no name or details were given, it was clear that iPhone gamers would soon be delving into the Prince's Arabian worlds.

The Principal of it all

In a Gameloft podcast, the game was revealed as Prince of Persia: Warrior Within. There's also a trailer to watch which doesn't really give anything away about how the iPhone version will play.

The video shows the Prince running through deserted streets, within a dark swirling force following closely behind. Jump to nine minutes into the podcast to check it out for yourself.

It's also not clear whether this will be a full 3D adventure like its console counterparts, or a more simple side-scrolling platformer. We'd guess at the latter.

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within was originally the sequel to Sands of Time on the PC and various consoles, so if you've played the time-bending Tomb Raider-like platformer, the story should hopefully follow on from it.

No word on when the release will be, but we'll keep you posted.
